channel.title: [Repost] How to get almost any program for FREE! by Ron
channel.description:
This thread was deleted sometime ago for reasons I do not know. I found it to be extremely helpful, and wished to repost it. I found it quoted in a thread and was elated, so I've reposted it down here for your enjoyment. I did edit it though to be more current. All credits go to Ron, the original creator.
[center][b][size=20pt]How to get almost any program for FREE![/size][/b] by Ron[/center]
[b]-> Just the Basics[/b] I'm sure a lot of you know this, but even more of you don't know about it. It's called torrents. Torrents are files that let you download an exact match of the file you're looking for from other people. Just like on KaZaA or something, but only EXACT ones will appear, so if anyone embedded any viruses, then you wouldn't see that seeder. A seeder is someone who has the file and one you can download from.
[url=http://www.utorrent.com/]Download uTorrent[/url]. Install it, and get your butt back here. Also, I know there are different programs for downloading torrents, but uTorrent is so easy and very small in size, that it's perfect. It is simply the best torrent client for Windows
You got the program, now you need torrents. Where do you get torrents? Well there are many websites out there that carry them, but you only want to go to one, because 90% of the other websites that have torrents are infested with spyware and other junk, but feel free to try them by searching on google for torrents or whatever.
The website you want to get torrents from is called [url=http://www.isohunt.com]ISOHunt[/url] or you could check out [url=http://www.thepiratebay.org/]ThePirateBay.org[/url] and also [url=http://www.demonoid.com]Demonoid.com[/url] is very good. Just search for whatever you like such as photoshop, flash, etcetera. You will find it. When you download the torrent, make sure it has a lot of seeders so you can actually download it. BitTorrent is just like a P2P app, except torrents are much cleaner than individual files that you would get from KaZaA or Limewire.
[b]-> Set up BitTorrent 4.20.4[/b]
[ul][*] Open up BitTorrent and go to View > Settings [*] On the General Tab, I checked the first two and the fifth checkboxes. [*] On the Saving Tab, for the "Move Completed Downloads to" browse to a spot where you can store your torrents. Mine is C:\Ron\Torrents. If you're paranoid that your parents may find out, then make sure to hide where you keep your torrents by making a folder like... C:\Windows\Important Documents. And for the "Store Unfinished Downloads In", just leave it the way it is. [*] On the Network Tab, it should be set to "Autodetect available bandwidth" and for the "Look for an available port" just pick a random number from 1024-65535 and leave "Enable automatic port mapping (UPnP)" checked. [*] On the Appearance Tab, it's confusing for me to see the bits and pieces instead of an Ordinary Progress Bar. On the Toolbar Style, I checked "Show Text" and chose Small for the Icon Size. [*] On the Language Tab, just pick whatever language you're most comfortable with. :)[/ul]
[b]EDIT: See http://www.utorrent.com/documentation/connection-setup for configuring uTorrent[/b]
WARNING! The torrents are [u]not always[/u] clean and/or spyware free. Just be careful, and try to read people's reviews, and see what they say. Normally the first poster will say if it worked or if its clean or not. Check what the others said to be absolutely sure.
WAIT! IF YOU HAVE/KNOW ANY GOOD PROGRAMS THAT REQUIRE A KEY OR SOME KIND OF HACK. PLEASE UPLOAD THEM AND THEN POST IT HERE. I'LL CREDIT YOU AND ADD THE PROGRAM. WE ONLY HAVE 20 SOMETHING PROGRAMS!! WE NEED MORE!!!! Greed... :rolleyes:
[b]-> Programs Predownloaded just for you :) Update 3/6/2010: Not all links work anymore[/b] Some files are from torrents from [url=http://www.torrentspy.com]TorrentSpy.com[/url] and some are serials from [url=http://www.serials.ws]Serials.ws[/url] (which is spyware infected and it's recommended that you [u]do not[/u] go there). For each program, just follow the instructions to install it properly. Most of the time, the install information is in the below files.
[b]For your sake please DO NOT register for any of the below programs.[/b]
[ul][*][iurl=#alcohol]Alcohol 120%[/iurl] [*][iurl=#adaware]Ad-Aware Pro 1.0.6[/iurl] [*][iurl=#ps]Adobe Photoshop CS2[/iurl] [*][iurl=#ashampoo]Ashampoo Burning Studio 6.xx[/iurl] [*][iurl=#camtasia]Camtasia Studio 3.1[/iurl] [*][iurl=#vgs]Connectix VGS[/iurl] [*][iurl=#divx]DivX 6.x[/iurl] [*][iurl=#ip]Hide IP Platinum 2.4[/iurl] [*][iurl=#invision]Invision Board 2.1.4[/iurl] [*][iurl=#iolo]Iolo System Mechanic Professional[/iurl] :) [*][iurl=#limewire]Limewire Pro[/iurl] [*][iurl=#dw]Macromedia Dreamweaver 8[/iurl] [*][iurl=#flash]Macromedia Flash 8[/iurl] [*][iurl=#mc]McAfee Firewall[/iurl] [*][iurl=#mop2003]Microsoft Office Professional 2003[/iurl] [*][iurl=#nero]Nero 7.xxxxx[/iurl] [*][iurl=#partition]Partitioning Software[/iurl] [*][iurl=#proxy]Proxy Switcher Standard[/iurl] [*][iurl=#quicktime]QuickTime 7[/iurl] [*][iurl=#rm]Registry Mechanic 5.2[/iurl] [*][iurl=#tu]Total Uninstall[/iurl] [*][iurl=#vbulletin]vBulletin[/iurl] [*][iurl=#verbix]Verbix 7.2.2[/iurl] [*][iurl=#vb]Visual Basic 6[/iurl] [*][iurl=#winamp]WinAmp Pro 5[/iurl] [*][iurl=#winrar]WinRar 3[/iurl] [*][iurl=#winzip]WinZip 10[/iurl][/ul]
.
[anchor=ps][b]Program:[/b] Adobe Photoshop Version CS2[/anchor] [b]About:[/b] An excellent image creating program. - Download the try out version from [url=http://download.adobe.com/pub/adobe/photoshop/win/cs2/Photoshop_CS2_tryout.zip]here[/url] and if that link doesn't work then try look for it [url=http://www.adobe.com]here[/url]. - Download this crack from [url=http://www.uploading.com/?get=QS1ECQ3E]here[/url].
[anchor=alcohol][b]Program:[/b] Alcohol 120%[/anchor] [b]About:[/b] A very very very good burning program for both games and dvds. - Download it and the crack from [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=EQW9LOU9]here[/url].
[anchor=flash][b]Program[/b]: Macromedia Flash 8[/anchor] [b]About:[/b] Let's you make flash programs like most of the animations and games you see online. - Download the try out version from [url=http://www.macromedia.com]here[/url]. Note: You have to sign up to download. - Registration Key/Serial: WPD800-52830-64832-84599 - Note: Entering this code in, unlocks all future macromedia products.
[anchor=dw][b]Program:[/b] Macromedia Dreamweaver 8[/anchor] [b]About:[/b] Great program for web development with built in FTP and a HTML validator. - Download the try out version from [url=http://www.macromedia.com]here[/url]. Note: You have to sign up to download. - Registration Key/Serial: WPD800-52830-64832-84599 - Note: Entering this code in, unlocks all future macromedia products
[anchor=winzip][b]Program:[/b] WinZip 10[/anchor] [b]About:[/b] Let's you open any WinZip files and more. - Download the try out version from [url=http://www.download.com/WinZip/3000-2250_4-10454671.html]here[/url]. - Registered User: Serials - Registration Key/Serial: VHY1X-KZ945-VVWRC-9YQQ6-AKYRT
[anchor=winrar][b]Program:[/b] WinRar 3[/anchor] [b]About:[/b] Let's you open any WinRar files and more. - Download the try out and crack from [url=http://www.uploading.com/?get=5WXG1630]here[/url].
[anchor=camtasia][b]Program:[/b] Camtasia Studio 3.1[/anchor] - xxhellfirexx [b]About:[/b] A great program to videotape whatever you're doing on the computer. You could copy an animation, make a video tutorial, or even show your friends a pking movie of yours. - Download the try out version from [url=http://www.mooload.com/new/file.php?file=files/201106/1163996591/camtasiaf.exe]here[/url]. - Registration Key/Serial: 299B9CACCBACC021607142849
[anchor=quicktime][b]Program:[/b] QuickTime 7[/anchor] [b]About:[/b] Watch any QuickTime movies and great movie trailers from [url=http://www.apple.com/trailers/]Apple.com[/url]. - Download the try out version from [url=http://www.download.com/3000-2194-10002208.html]here[/url]. - Registered User: Dawn M Fredette - Registration Key/Serial: 4UJ2-5NLF-HFFA-9JW3-X2KV
[anchor=winamp][b]Program:[/b] WinAmp Pro 5[/anchor] NOT WORKING SORRY! [b]About:[/b] A wonderful program for music. Make playlists, crazy skins, and much more. Similar to Windows Media Player. - Download the try out version from [url=http://download.nullsoft.com/winamp/client/winamp521_pro.exe]here[/url]. - Registered User: Free Program - Registration Key/Serial: DCZ7F-VQ87X-O27TO-B8NJP
[anchor=limewire][b]Program:[/b] Limewire Pro (always the latest version) - Thanks to afi[/anchor] [b]About:[/b] The professional version of Limewire - Download it and install from [url=http://www.info.com.ph/~cyberray/download.html]here[/url]. - Pick a download. - Password is on the page, and just hit download.
[anchor=rm][b]Program:[/b] Registry Mechanic 5.2[/anchor] - Thanks for fixing this, uncfan1119! [b]About:[/b] This is a very very good registry cleaner. Many features too. - Download site: www.pctools.com (Downloads>Registry Mechanic) - License Name: Adam Dastmalchi - License Code: FCD0-AC78-1D9F-347C-AB62-2237-5801-B759
[anchor=adaware][b]Program:[/b] Ad-Aware Pro 1.0.6[/anchor] [b]About:[/b] A good program to detect and remove Adware found on your computer. - Download it and install from [url=http://www.uploading.com/?get=Z29Z2IYO]here[/url].
[anchor=verbix][b]Program:[/b] Verbix 7.2.2[/anchor] [b]About:[/b] Verb conjugations for almost any language! I used this for my Spanish class for 4 years. - Download the try out version from [url=http://www.verbix.com/download/]here[/url]. - Registered User: iNFECTED - Registration Key/Serial: P0kpFPVTbM
[anchor=nero][b]Program:[/b] Nero 7.xxxxx[/anchor] [b]About:[/b] A program to copy CD's and DVD's and do other stuff with those. - Download the try out version from [url=http://www.afterdawn.com/software/cdr_software/cdr_applications/nero.cfm]here[/url]. - Download this crack from [url=http://www.uploading.com/?get=EVFVRII9]here[/url]. - This is a good program, but it installs a lot of junk on your computer. Not bad stuff or anything, just Nero went too far and went too beyond you know? If you just want a simple CD/DVD burner/ripper then just use Windows Media Player. Simple is so much better than the latest and newest thing. But hey, if you need the extra features Nero supplies, then download it and have fun. :)
[anchor=divx][b]Program:[/b] DivX 6.x[/anchor] NOT WORKING SORRY! [b]About:[/b] Superb program on conversion and movie player. - Download the try out and crack from [url=http://www.uploading.com/?get=H08G6DDS]here[/url]. - Once you followed the instructions in there. Make sure to close down the program, then go to Start > Programs > DivX > Check for DivX Updates and download the 6.2 or whatever bundle pack.
[anchor=invision][b]Program:[/b] Invision Board 2.1.4[/anchor] - Dead Bird [b]About:[/b] Awesome forum! Better than phpBB, proboards, and other free forums. - Download it from http://www.megaupload.com/?d=YV1Y4YNH http://www.filefactory.com/file/66f5a4/ - Thanks to Rum0
[anchor=vb][b]Program:[/b] Visual Studio 6[/anchor] NOT WORKING SORRY! [b]About:[/b] Program for making programs lol. - Download it from [url=http://thugie.thelastgun.com/Visual-Studio-6.0.ISO-IND.rar]here[/url]. - Registration Key/Serial: 040-5003312
[anchor=ashampoo][b]Program:[/b] Ashampoo Burning Studio 6.xx[/anchor] [b]About:[/b] A very very awesome program for burning. A size of about 14 MB and much faster and easier to use like the god Nero claims to be. - Download the try out version from [url=http://www.download.com/Ashampoo-Burning-Studio/3000-2646_4-10511238.html]here[/url]. - Registration Key/Serial: BRS6A5-77HS4F-KHTBFP
[anchor=iolo][b]Program:[/b] Iolo System Mechanic Professional[/anchor] - Thanks to Starblaster100 [b]About:[/b] A program to optimize Windows. Has built in Anti-Virus, a Great Firewall, and much more pertaining to security! - Download the try out version with the key generator from [url=http://rapidshare.de/files/32527835/System_Mechanic_v6.0i_Standard___PRO_Edition.rar.html]here[/url]. - If that crack doesn't work, use this, but only if the previous one doesn't work!!! - Thanks to uberkiller. - Don't copy and paste the code, type it in. - Registration Name: HaWK 7 =SnD= TeAM - Registration Key/Serial: 89841-P6113=6212114117 - If that doesn't work, try this [url=http://rapidshare.de/files/23632611/SystemMechanic6-Kg.rar.html]crack[/url]. Thanks to afi.
[anchor=ip][b]Program:[/b] Hide IP Platinum 2.4 - Thanks to Got_Shine[/anchor] [b]About:[/b] Sets you as a proxy and hides your IP so you get hacked less. - Download the try out version from [url=http://www.hide-ip-soft.com/download/hideippla.exe]here[/url] - Download the crack from [url=http://rapidshare.de/files/13214500/tinku-hi-ip-pla-KGN.7z.html]here[/url].
Vbulletin 3.6.0 - Thank you Ollie, DeadBird, Rum0 download: http://www.ihud.com/file.php?file=files/020102/1009963957/vBulletinv3.6-uploaded-by_W-M.rar password: www.warez-bb.org
[anchor=partition][b]Program:[/b] Partitioning Software[/anchor] [b]About:[/b] A program to make more than one drive on your computer, incase you want more than one OS or something. - Download it from [url=http://www.uploading.com/?get=FCE3JFKW]here[/url]. - Note: BE VERY FUCKING CAREFUL WITH THIS SOFTWARE!!! IF YOU PARTITION OVER YOUR WINDOWS XP DRIVE THEN WINDOWS XP WILL BE COMPLETELY WIPED OUT!!!
[anchor=tu][b]Program:[/b] Total Uninstall[/anchor] [b]About:[/b] Monitors every change, every registry entry made when you install something, so you can remove it COMPLETELY when you want to uninstall it. - Download it from [url=http://www.martau.com/tu_download.php]here[/url]. - Registered User: Sardas Co. - Registration Key/Serial: RQFONBA2AIS0UJRPH5NQ
[anchor=proxy][b]Program:[/b] Proxy Switcher Standard - Thanks to Aftermath_96[/anchor] [b]About:[/b] A proxy switcher. The trial lasts for 15 days, just reinstall to get another 15 days. - Download it from [url=http://www.proxyswitcher.com/pub/ProxySwitcherStandard.exe]here[/url] - This file is legal and iit is from www.ProxySwitcher.com
[anchor=vgs][b]Program:[/b] Connectix VGS[/anchor] [b]About:[/b] Program to allow you to play PS1 and PS2 games right on your computer. - Download it from [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=WWW1DZC8]here[/url].
[anchor=mc][b]Program:[/b] McAfee Firewall - Thanks to irfan786[/anchor] [b]About:[/b] Firewall to protect your computer. - Download it from [url=http://download.mcafee.com/products/licensed/mis/english/8.0/MIS8_113_en-US_1.exe]here[/url]. - It does nto require a serial key or crack and this is from the official site.
[anchor=mop2003][b]Program[/b]: Microsoft Office Professional 2003 - Thanks to leader[/anchor] [b]About[/b]: It has Microsoft Word, Powerpoint, Outlook, Access, Excel, OneNote, and more. -Download it [url=http://d01.megashares.com/?d01=f5d6a4f]here[/url] -Extract with WinRAR (Password is z4z) -No serial needed.
WAIT! IF YOU HAVE/KNOW ANY GOOD PROGRAMS THAT REQUIRE A KEY OR SOME KIND OF HACK. PLEASE UPLOAD THEM AND THEN POST IT HERE. I'LL CREDIT YOU AND ADD THE PROGRAM. WE ONLY HAVE 20 SOMETHING PROGRAMS!! WE NEED MORE!!!! Greed... :rolleyes:
[b]-> The 3 Most Recent Updates[/b] 01/26/07: Fixed Registry Mechanic. Thanks to uncfan1119. 01/22/07: Fixed IPB. Thanks to Rum0. 11/20/06: Fixed camtasia download. Thanks to xxhellfirexx.
~Ron
PS: I don't use any of these illegal files. I haven't uploaded any of them and I do not use any of them. If you get in any trouble by using these files, it's your head. I am not responsible for anything illegal here, I just simply link to it.

item.title: [Repost] How to get almost any program for FREE! by Ron
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

That was a fun thread back 4 years ago haha. I love free stuff and I still torrent. Just downloaded Rosetta Stone for my friend’s mom so she can learn English since she’s from Romania. Wicked cute too.

Anyway, the reason my original thread was locked or removed was because this forum decided not to link to anything illegal including warez and hacks. So I had to abandon it.

If you want to expand on this thread, before it gets locked, just teach people how to torrent by writing a tutorial for the current version of the clients. uTorrent, Transmission, Deluge, Yet ABC (Another BitTorrent Client)

My personal favorite would be Transmission. I used to use uTorrent but decided I needed something a little bit more free/open so I went with Transmission.

Read full topic

@ghostboy195 wrote:

This thread was deleted sometime ago for reasons I do not know. I found it to be extremely helpful, and wished to repost it. I found it quoted in a thread and was elated, so I’ve reposted it down here for your enjoyment. I did edit it though to be more current. All credits go to Ron, the original creator.

[center][size=20pt]How to get almost any program for FREE![/size]
by Ron[/center]

-> Just the Basics
I’m sure a lot of you know this, but even more of you don’t know about it. It’s called torrents. Torrents are files that let you download an exact match of the file you’re looking for from other people. Just like on KaZaA or something, but only EXACT ones will appear, so if anyone embedded any viruses, then you wouldn’t see that seeder. A seeder is someone who has the file and one you can download from.

Download uTorrent. Install it, and get your butt back here. Also, I know there are different programs for downloading torrents, but uTorrent is so easy and very small in size, that it’s perfect. It is simply the best torrent client for Windows

You got the program, now you need torrents. Where do you get torrents? Well there are many websites out there that carry them, but you only want to go to one, because 90% of the other websites that have torrents are infested with spyware and other junk, but feel free to try them by searching on google for torrents or whatever.

The website you want to get torrents from is called ISOHunt or you could check out ThePirateBay.org and also Demonoid.com is very good. Just search for whatever you like such as photoshop, flash, etcetera. You will find it. When you download the torrent, make sure it has a lot of seeders so you can actually download it. BitTorrent is just like a P2P app, except torrents are much cleaner than individual files that you would get from KaZaA or Limewire.

-> Set up BitTorrent 4.20.4

[ul][] Open up BitTorrent and go to View > Settings
[] On the General Tab, I checked the first two and the fifth checkboxes.
[] On the Saving Tab, for the “Move Completed Downloads to” browse to a spot where you can store your torrents. Mine is C:\Ron\Torrents. If you’re paranoid that your parents may find out, then make sure to hide where you keep your torrents by making a folder like… C:\Windows\Important Documents. And for the “Store Unfinished Downloads In”, just leave it the way it is.
[] On the Network Tab, it should be set to “Autodetect available bandwidth” and for the “Look for an available port” just pick a random number from 1024-65535 and leave “Enable automatic port mapping (UPnP)” checked.
[] On the Appearance Tab, it’s confusing for me to see the bits and pieces instead of an Ordinary Progress Bar. On the Toolbar Style, I checked “Show Text” and chose Small for the Icon Size.
[] On the Language Tab, just pick whatever language you’re most comfortable with. :)[/ul]

EDIT: See http://www.utorrent.com/documentation/connection-setup for configuring uTorrent

WARNING! The torrents are not always clean and/or spyware free. Just be careful, and try to read people’s reviews, and see what they say. Normally the first poster will say if it worked or if its clean or not. Check what the others said to be absolutely sure.

Some files are from torrents from TorrentSpy.com and some are serials from Serials.ws (which is spyware infected and it’s recommended that you do not go there). For each program, just follow the instructions to install it properly. Most of the time, the install information is in the below files.

[anchor=ps]Program: Adobe Photoshop Version CS2[/anchor]
About: An excellent image creating program.
